4980/A0/04/811/003.status_value: A draft National Social Protection Policy was developed and submitted to cabinet. This comprehensive framework  is based on four pillars [social assistance  social security  livelihoods and empowerment  protection] and as such lays a strong foundation for policy coherence  policy coordination  and the establishment of adequate institutional arrangements for the effective delivery of social protection.
